title: Virtual Project Manager
job_overview:
Our company is an award-winning marketing and creative agency based in Singapore focusing on retail, tech and beauty. Our clients over the last decade have included BlackBerry, BMW M, Sony, Guardian, Watsons and 7-Eleven.

We are seeking a Virtual Project Manager to support a client in Singapore. The role entails writing of project briefs, liaising creative production teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.

Key Responsibilities
• Take full ownership of assigned tasks, working in tandem with the creative team to ensure seamless project execution and alignment with client goals.
• Establish clear internal timelines for all project stages and proactively monitor progress to ensure deadlines are consistently met by the internal team.
• Writing clear, concise, and effective creative briefs.
• Strong understanding of creative development processes and the ability to effectively communicate creative direction.

Requirements
• At least 1 year of agency/advertising experience 
• Social media experience is a plus
• Fluent and proficient in English 
• Strong sense of responsibility and reliability in meeting deadlines and delivering quality work
• Self-motivated with a strong work ethic and attention to detail
• Your own working computer
